comment._content: Ferdinand was czar of Bulgaria from 1908-1918. www.encyclopedia.com/doc/1E1-FerdiBul.html

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Adrianople is in the area between Bulgaria and Turkey over which the Balkan Wars of 1912-13 were fought. See www.jcanu.hpg.ig.com.br/history/h4sep/bulgamil.htm

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: Thanks for your additional information. We will add it to the source data and reload the description.
